Articles.Content:
Orion & Lockheed Martin Mars Vehicle

 

So i decided to re-create the Lockheed Martin's facebook post of their new spacecraft

they may send to mars to put humans on the Martian Surface and this is what i got out of it

It successfully transfered to Duna and entered Duna orbit with a few aerobrakes of course

it has 4 engines like the spacecraft in the picture excluding Orion's engine

and it fits up to about 3-2 crew 2 if there was no Orion spacecraft docked onto because

well i forgot to put a passenger module on it. 

 

So... what do you think?
